title: Reporters will have to cultivate trust the old-school way
description: If the currency of good journalism is sustained access, the gold standard of that access is trust. And two years into this chaotic and manipulative news environment, in 2026, we will have to go back to fundamental journalistic practices to rebuild trust-based relationships, the kind that yield news stories that topple corruption, erode secrecy, protect...
